rukus.text: You who believe, do not be like those who harassed Moses, then God cleared him of what they said, and he is respected before God
You who believe, be cautious of God and say right (and appropriate) word
so He corrects (and improves) you works for you, and to forgive your sins for you. And whoever obeys God and His messenger then he has achieved a great victory

Indeed We offered the trust to the skies and the earth and the mountains, but they refused to undertake it and they were afraid of it, but the human being undertook it. Indeed he is wrongdoer and ignorant

So that God punishes the hypocrite men and the hypocrite women, and the polytheist men and the polytheist women, and He turns (in mercy) to the believing men and the believing women. And God is forgiving and merciful
